website_summaries.verdict: Popular spicy-and-mildly-sweet ginger beer imported from the U.K., available in quantity at a reasonable price.
pros: Imported from the UK, a spicy ginger beer at a very affordable price
Well-carbonated, flavorful and non-bitter without being overly sweet
Can order in package of 24 cans, making it convenient and cans are recyclable
cons: Small number of buyers claimed some of the cans in the pack arrived dented

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sweet is my preferred combination for ginger beer, and Royalty has them both. It goes down easily, which makes it easy to glug, which I have difficulty not doing. But buying it by the case, I can afford to glug a few. You can pay more for the more expensive bottles, but they don't improve the quality of what's inside, despite what you may have been told. This is rich ginger content without bitterness. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great price and taste, especially for moscow mules!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed creating various cocktails recently and my boyfriend's new favorite was Moscow mules. I am in no way a professional so I review this with a "generic" understanding of flavors and such. I'm sure true mixologists would have a more focused palette to go by. We thought these were great tasting, very carbonated and for the price, hard to beat! They had a very nice ginger taste to them and weren't sickeningly sweet. Also none of the cans we received were dented!
customer_reviews.author: fashion_fit2014

customer_reviews.title: Great DIET ginger beer!
customer_reviews.text: Has the zing that is often missing in other brands and if you track the prices at Amazon, you can get this product for a reasonable price tag. But do watch because it goes up and down almost at whim.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy World

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but not great compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably more of a matter of taste but I find that Royalty Ginger Beer is a bit too sweet for my taste. I prefer a dry, crisp ginger beer and this is more of a syrupy sweet ginger beer, in fact most ginger ales are dryer than this. I did enjoy it as a mixer and tried some different cocktails than normal to capitalize on the sweetness and they turned out good. If you are looking for a traditional ginger beer you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Rope Garage

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: Super sweet and generally foul tasting. I thought it might be some sort of cheap synthetic sweetener but the label said it’s sugar. Who knew you could ruin ginger ale?
customer_reviews.author: Carl L Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like this product at all
customer_reviews.text: The taste was not good. Way too sweet and little ginger taste. It also gave me a headache......not a natural product but loaded with additives....awful.
customer_reviews.author: William Baillie

customer_reviews.title: One my new favorite ginger beers.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ginger beer. No too sweet and makes a delicious Dark n Stormy.
customer_reviews.author: California Ranch Life

customer_reviews.title: Not gingery enough
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet, tastes more like regular ginger ale. It’s not putrid but I could buy 2 12 packs of Schweppes for a lot less than $33. Was looking for something with a much more pronounced ginger flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Skigirlie

customer_reviews.title: good ginger flavor, but really sweet
customer_reviews.text: I prefer my ginger beer more on the drier side. This is sweet, if you like sweeter ginger beer this may be for you. Overall nice ginger flavor just goes too sweet for me
customer_reviews.author: t clarke harris

customer_reviews.title: wonderful soft drink but five of the cans were dented in several places.
customer_reviews.text: We love this drink and I am so happy to have found it on Amazon. The only complaint is that either before or after it was packaged to send to us five of the cans got badly dented. I have not complained about it this time but will have to do so if it happens again. Otherwise if you love gingery drinks this is a really good one.
customer_reviews.author: B K I

customer_reviews.title: A tad sweet but strong wonderful ginger beer taste
customer_reviews.text: A tad sweet but strong wonderful ginger beer taste. I "cut" it with fresh lime and Angostura bitters and even add a little club soda or mineral water to truly "balance" the taste. Each person's mileage may vary and it's quality excellence in a Moscow Mule or ginger adult beverage of choice. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Snyder

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite ginger beers
customer_reviews.text: Great ginger beer, great deal for a flat. For the price, it's an excellent option.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Moran

customer_reviews.title: Best diet Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting diet ginger beer. It has a crisp ginger flavor I didn't find in other diet ginger beers I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but special drink
customer_reviews.text: This has to be our favorite non alcoholic drink. It has a gentle taste and if you want to make it that little bit more special - a few drops of angostura bitters will do the trick. Still our favorite. 03/2017
customer_reviews.author: B K I

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for mules!! Friends love it too. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Mary Margaret of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: BLAHHH...
customer_reviews.text: Great packing & shipping but gotta go negative on the product. Tastes like Tesco sugar free ginger beer. I bought a case and have only used 2 cans. Waiting for school to start maybe some kids will drink them with lunch. I'll stick with the Gosslings, much much better.
customer_reviews.author: larry palm

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tried all of them and, to me, this one is the best value and best tasting...
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Moscow Mules are yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the bottled ginger beer. I bought this brand to go with some copper cups as a gift for someone and it worked out great! The ginger beer is fresh and delicious and way cheaper than the bottled. The cans are recyclable as well so all around a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: NNChick

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than any other ginger beer out there. Best sweet and spicy balance. Much better than Gosling and the Australian one.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Kick
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal! Very smooth with a good kick of ginger! Can be a little to sweet if using to mix with
customer_reviews.author: Derines

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Beer.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and got it on a Sunday! Perfect for Moscow Mules.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Dark and Stormy....
customer_reviews.text: Royalty Ginger Beer is great to make a Dark and Stormy... Ice in a tall glass, 1.5 oz Dark Rum, juice of 1/2 a lime, fill glass with ginger beer and garnish with lime wedge and serve with a straw.... yum... enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: bought to use in a few different drinks and tastes great. Definitely better than other brands I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, bought to use in a few different drinks and tastes great. Definitely better than other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: We bought two cases of this for our wedding because we were making Moscow Mules, and we needed it fast (within a few days). We couldn't find any ginger beer around us that wasn't crazy expensive. This stuff worked great. It is a bit sweeter than I would have wanted ideally, but it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think these make the best Moscow mule. Juice a half a lime and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JtBeck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet. Prefer Stoli. Or Pepsi original ginger cola for mules
customer_reviews.author: Remodeling in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great Moscow Mule. Fair price and the usual quick Amazon delivery
customer_reviews.author: HDKarbo

customer_reviews.title: still a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: One arrived leaking, UPS offered to send it back but I just wash several cans, still a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong aftertaste that almost tastes like an artificial sweetener. It is not my favorite and will likely not purchase this again even though it is on Amazon Prime :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Thorsby

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite drinks is a Dark & Stormy. This is by far my favorite ginger beer to use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the flavoring of this ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the flavoring of this ginger beer, I wish I could find it in stores near me! Great in Moscow mules!!
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: OK but not real good for Moscow Mules
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but I prefer a better ginger beer for my Moscow Mules.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best drink ever. Mix with Vodka and Lime juice over ice. To die for HA!~ Enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: JD ORT

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. It's a little sweeter than normal ginger beer (does have quite a bit of sugar) and has less of a ginger taste than i'm used to, but still good
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cox

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was too sweet compared to other ginger beers
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was too sweet compared to other ginger beers. Wanted more gingery taste. Theres not even a hint of spiciness
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - better than the local stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best available but it is close. Better than anything you can get in stores here - including Cost Plus! It's worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Dark and Stormy
customer_reviews.text: If you love Dark & Stormy cocktails than this is the Ginger Beer for you! We've tried others but this is my husband's favorite mixed with Goslings Rum. Takes one back to Bermuda any time of day!
customer_reviews.author: kbringe

customer_reviews.title: Great Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to be able to buy this product. It is hard to find a good ginger beer here in the U S A
customer_reviews.author: Alroyp

customer_reviews.title: good change from cola
customer_reviews.text: It was different from the ginger beer we had in austraila. It was a lot stronger taste. Still it was good.
customer_reviews.author: daniel oskey

customer_reviews.title: Yuck...
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I got a bad batch. But this tasted overly sweet with very little Ginger taste. It also had an aftertaste I can only describe as like dirt or sand. 4 out the 24 that were shipped were punctured and made a huge mess. I made it through a six pack of this stuff and I dont want to drink anymore. Maybe British style Ginger Beer is supposed to taste like this but I dont like it. Cock n Bull and Fever tree give me more of the Ginger kick im looking for without the terrible aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sent diet
customer_reviews.text: Did not order diet but that is what was sent. Buyer beware I guess with this company. Don't see anything on the desciption that says diet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike67846
